articles.title: People diagnosed with ADHD as adults could be ‘at greater risk of dementia’
articles.description: Study does not establish cause and effect, and experts say it highlights need for further research
articles.content:
People who are diagnosed with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) as adults could be at greater risk of developing dementia later in life, research suggests.
While experts cautioned that the study did not establish whether the apparent li... [3507 chars]

articles.title: iPhone 15中國銷售不如上一代 分析：凸顯經濟疲軟
articles.description: 據市場追蹤機構Counterpoint Research的數據，蘋果iPhone 15在發布後17天內，旗艦設備銷售量比iPhone 14下降4.5%。這將是2018年以來，iPhone在中國的最糟糕首發之一。而在美國，iPhone 15前九天與去年相比，實現了兩位數增長。
articles.content:
iPhone 15中國銷售不如上一代 分析：凸顯經濟疲軟
【新唐人北京時間2023年10月18日訊】最新分析數據顯示，蘋果新款iPhone 15在中國的銷售量遠不如上一代產品iPhone 14。外界分析，這反映出中國經濟持續低迷，消費者購買力下降。同時，中共限制公務員和國企員工等使用蘋果手機，也對蘋果在中國的銷售造成影響。
據市場追蹤機構Counterpoint Research的數據，蘋果iPhone 15在發布後17天內，旗艦設備銷售量比iPhone 14下降4.5%。這將是2018年以來，... [757 chars]

articles.title: Google's "Green Light" AI project is improving traffic lights, cutting wait times and emissions
articles.description: Google Research AI program, Green Light, is easing traffic and reducing vehicle emissions in cities around the world, albeit on a reduced implementation for the time being....
articles.content: The big picture: Google is analyzing data from its maps to suggest how cities can adjust traffic light timing to optimize traffic flow and reduce emissions. The company claims it's already cutting stops for millions of drivers and believes that if op... [2983 chars]

articles.title: Chimpanzees make sounds like human babies as they learn to speak, study finds
articles.description: Research into 28 chimpanzees finds their pre-speech noises have a key component in common with babies learning to talk.
articles.content:
Young chimpanzees can make similar sounds to babies as they learn to speak, researchers have found.
Primates studied by the University of Portsmouth were capable of similar vocal functional flexibility to humans as they grew up.
The team filmed 28 in... [2171 chars]

articles.title: ANALYSE-FLASH: Warburg Research senkt Ziel für Infineon auf 46 Euro - 'Buy'
articles.description: ANALYSE-FLASH: Warburg Research senkt Ziel für Infineon auf 46 Euro - 'Buy' | finanzen.net
articles.content: HAMBURG (dpa-AFX Broker) - Das Analysehaus Warburg Research hat das Kursziel für Infineon von 46,50 auf 46,00 Euro gesenkt, aber die Einstufung auf "Buy" belassen. Im Rahmen einer Überarbeitung seines Bewertungsmodells für den Halbleiterkonzern habe ... [571 chars]

articles.title: Likely cause of Mars' biggest ever quake revealed after UK-led study
articles.description: Elon Musk has long spoken of his belief that humans should one day colonise Mars, and new research may inform exactly where they might want to live.
articles.content:
The likely cause of the biggest ever seismic event recorded on Mars has been revealed following a UK-led study.
The 4.7-magnitude quake was recorded by NASA's InSight lander on 4 May last year, causing vibrations that reverberated through the planet ... [2448 chars]

articles.title: L&T Technology réduit ses prévisions de croissance du chiffre d'affaires pour l'exercice en cours
articles.description: Indian engineering research and development services provider L&T Technology Services cut its revenue growth forecast for the current financial year on Tuesday, citing longer deal decision cycles...
articles.content: Le fournisseur indien de services d'ingénierie, de recherche et de développement L&T Technology Services a revu à la baisse ses prévisions de croissance du chiffre d'affaires pour l'exercice en cours, mardi, invoquant des cycles de décision plus long... [2056 chars]

articles.title: Here's what most people hope to inherit from loved ones: poll
articles.description: Americans would rather inherit a pet from a loved one than a car, according to new research.
articles.content:
Americans would rather inherit a pet from a loved one than a car, according to new research.
A poll of 2,000 U.S. adults revealed that the top assets respondents would like to inherit one day are a house or property (65%), followed by their four-legg... [3539 chars]

articles.title: Medtronic signs €5m five-year partnership with NUI Galway
articles.description: Investment will support two new research institutes and development of university’s medtech ecosystem
articles.content:
Medical device giant Medtronic has announced a €5 million five-year partnership with NUI Galway to support innovation in the sector in a move that is seen as reinforcing the city’s standing as Ireland medtech hub.

articles.title: Smartphone shipments hit decade-low in Q3 2023: Counterpoint
articles.description: According to market research firm Counterpoint, smartphone shipments suffered an 8% YoY decline globally in Q3 2023.
articles.content: The first half of 2023 wasn’t kind to the smartphone industry. Sales dropped globally, with pretty much every major vendor suffering a decline in shipments. It appears the second half won’t be any better. According to market research firm Counterpoin... [2319 chars]
